mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARE_MEDICINE (pet_seq, medicine_type, date, memo, cnt, nickname) VALUES (#{petSeq}, #{medicineType}, #{date}, #{memo}, #{cnt}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT medicine_seq, pet_seq, medicine_type, date, memo, cnt, nickname FROM CARE_MEDICINE WHERE pet_seq = #{petSeq} AND DATE(date) = DATE(#{date})
mapper.update: UPDATE CARE_MEDICINE SET memo = #{memo}, medicine_type = #{medicineType}, cnt = #{cnt} WHERE pet_seq = #{petSeq} AND DATE(date) = DATE(#{date})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CARE_MEDICINE WHERE pet_seq = #{petSeq} AND DATE(date) = DATE(#{date})
